```{r setup}
library(blueostrich)
library(ggplot2)
```

## An amazing plot!

```{r}
ggplot(data = ostriches, aes(x = height_m, y = mass_kg)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_text(aes(label = name), nudge_y = 1) +
  theme_light() +
  labs(x = "Height (m)",
       y = "Mass (kg)",
       title = "Ostrich size measurements")
```
